text: Jara tumhi tyanna vicarala ki akasanna va dharatila koni nirmana kele ahe, tara te niscita heca uttara detila ki allahane! Tumhi tyanna sanga ki, bare he tara sanga ki jyanna tumhi allahakherija pukarata, jara allaha mala nukasana pohocavu icchila, tara kaya he tyacya nukasanala hatavu sakatata kinva jara allaha majhyavara krpa karu icchita asela tara kaya he tyacya krpela adavu sakatata? (Tumhi) sanga ki allaha (mahana) mala puresa ahe. Bharavasa rakhanare tyacyavaraca bharavasa rakhatata
